thread.section_title: iFlyBusiness Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iFlyBusiness | iflybusiness.com
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: Henry Poryes of IFlyBusiness was extremely professional and efficient in searching and obtaining two business class tickets for me to escort my 85 year old mother to Rome (on her bucket list). He was so accommodating and suggested we try non-stop flights for travel ease on behalf of my mother. I will definitely recommend IFlyBusiness to anyone wanting to fly business class, domestically or abroad. Thank you so much for you help. I had been searchng multiple travel and airline websites for almost two weeks when I stumbled across your name while googling business class ticketss
